title: kai kooDa
sahitya:
kaikkUDa vENumE kandA ninnaruL enakkum



anupallavi



meikkUDu tamizh muni nakkIrar arunagirikkum ayyA nin aruL vandu kUDiyavar
adu pOl



caraNam



sutAnga sOmasundarra pangil umA latAngi mInAngi nayani bAlA
matAnga shUranuDan mALa vEl vAngugira dalAnga kavi kunjaradAsan shentamizh
Onga
